document.description: My order stated that a free gift cannot be included ... sale, and it still wont let me get the free item. ... Fast Food & Restaurant Coupons; Drug Store & Pharmacy Coupons

01-03-2008, 02:08 PM #1 andi View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries Visit Homepage View Articles Registered User Join Date Mar 2001 Posts 2,207 $10 Off Any Order&Figi's Clearance Sale $10 off your order Code: 586/7820 (code goes in the yellow box at checkout)
http://click.linksynergy.com/fs-bin/...subid=0&type=4 Last edited by Admin; 01-03-2008 at 02:15 PM . Reply With Quote 01-03-2008, 02:14 PM #2 daisymae View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries Visit Homepage View Articles Join Date Feb 2002 Location WV Posts 1,575 Big sale&$10 off worked great!! Reply With Quote 01-03-2008, 02:23 PM #3 sarah5555 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries Visit Homepage View Articles Registered User Join Date Apr 2002 Posts 727 THankyou! Reply With Quote 01-03-2008, 02:27 PM #4 RENYE222 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date May 2006 Posts 220 Search for item 4286 ( the Free Gift Cheese&Sausage Pack) to add to your order Reply With Quote 01-03-2008, 02:46 PM #5 my3joes View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jan 2007 Posts 2,174 Originally Posted by RENYE222 Search for item 4286 ( the Free Gift Cheese&Sausage Pack) to add to your order When I add it to my cart, it says it can't be added to the order. I am going to start over and try again Reply With Quote 01-03-2008, 02:48 PM #6 flossie73 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles chat Join Date Jan 2002 Location MN Posts 5,789 My order stated that a free gift cannot be included with this order when I tried to submit it. Maybe you can't get it with the sale items?
I just removed the free cheese/sausage gift and it went through. Last edited by flossie73; 01-03-2008 at 02:53 PM . Reply With Quote 01-03-2008, 03:00 PM #7 Sweet Cheeks View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles 1/2007 Join Date Aug 2001 Posts 357
Originally Posted by flossie73 My order stated that a free gift cannot be included with this order when I tried to submit it. Maybe you can't get it with the sale items?
I just removed the free cheese/sausage gift and it went through. I tried to re-do it and get something that wasnt on sale, and it still wont let me get the free item. I even took off the $10 off code to see if thats why and it still wont let me
with the sale and $10 off is still a good deal though Reply With Quote 01-03-2008, 03:05 PM #8 flossie73 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles chat Join Date Jan 2002 Location MN Posts 5,789 Hmm. I just talked to an operator there and she said you could use one or the other, the free gift or the $10 off. Don't know why it wouldn't go through if you'd removed the $10 off code... Reply With Quote 01-03-2008, 04:39 PM #9 my3joes View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jan 2007 Posts 2,174 I went ahead and ordered too. I got a pretty good deal on some smoked brats for DH. Thanks OP for the code. Reply With Quote 01-03-2008, 05:22 PM #10 doloresflorida View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date May 2007 Posts 113 Great deal, thanks Reply With Quote
